#!/usr/bin/python
import sys

def main(argv=None):
    T = int(raw_input())
    countlist = []
    while T>0:
        count = 0
        N = int(raw_input())

        Pies = raw_input()
        Pies = Pies.split(' ')
        Pies = [int(i) for i in Pies]
        Pies.sort()

        CoolingRack = raw_input()
        CoolingRack = CoolingRack.split(' ')
        CoolingRack = [int(i) for i in CoolingRack]
        CoolingRack.sort()

        i = 0
        j = 0
        while j<N:
            if Pies[i]<=CoolingRack[j]:
                i=i+1
                j=j+1
                count=count+1
            else:
                j=j+1

        countlist.append(count)

        T=T-1

    for x in countlist:
        print x
if __name__=='__main__':
    sys.exit(main())
